skill.name: marketing-demand-acquisition
skill.description: Multi-channel demand generation, paid media optimization, SEO strategy, and partnership programs for Series A+ startups. Includes CAC calculator, channel playbooks, HubSpot integration, and international expansion tactics. Use when planning demand generation campaigns, optimizing paid media, building SEO strategies, establishing partnerships, or when user mentions demand gen, paid ads, LinkedIn ads, Google ads, CAC, acquisition, lead generation, or pipeline generation.
skill.summary: Multi-channel demand generation, paid media optimization, SEO strategy, and partnership programs for...
skill.author: davila7

security_audit.summary: This skill contains only prompt-based marketing guidance with a simple Python calculator script. No network calls, filesystem access, environment variables, or external commands were detected. The Python script performs basic arithmetic for CAC calculations and outputs results to console.

content.user_title: Build demand generation campaigns for B2B SaaS growth
content.value_statement: Planning and executing multi-channel demand generation campaigns is complex and time-consuming. This skill provides proven frameworks, channel playbooks, CAC calculators, and attribution strategies specifically designed for Series A+ B2B SaaS startups scaling internationally.
actual_capabilities: Create multi-channel demand generation campaigns across paid and organic channels
Optimize paid media spend across LinkedIn, Google Ads, and Meta platforms
Develop SEO strategies including technical audits, keyword research, and content planning
Build partnership and affiliate programs with tracking and attribution
Calculate and analyze customer acquisition cost by channel
Set up marketing attribution models and reporting dashboards in HubSpot
limitations: Does not execute campaigns or make changes to advertising accounts directly
Cannot access external APIs or fetch real-time campaign data
Does not provide financial projections or revenue forecasting
Assumes basic knowledge of marketing concepts and platform interfaces

use_cases.title: Plan quarterly campaigns
use_cases.description: Develop multi-channel campaign strategies with budget allocation, channel mix, and success metrics for leadership reporting.

use_cases.title: Optimize ad performance
use_cases.description: Create optimized ad campaigns for LinkedIn, Google, and Meta with targeting recommendations and bid strategies.

use_cases.title: Reduce acquisition costs
use_cases.description: Analyze CAC across channels, identify inefficient spend, and implement channel-specific optimization strategies.

prompt_templates.title: Basic campaign request
prompt_templates.prompt: Create a LinkedIn Ads campaign brief for targeting VP+ titles at Series B SaaS companies. Include campaign structure, budget recommendations, and success metrics.

prompt_templates.title: CAC analysis
prompt_templates.prompt: Help me analyze my channel CAC. I spent $15k on LinkedIn for 10 customers, $12k on Google for 20 customers, and $5k on SEO for 15 customers. Which channel is most efficient?

prompt_templates.title: SEO strategy
prompt_templates.prompt: Create a technical SEO audit checklist for a B2B SaaS website. Include Core Web Vitals targets, sitemap requirements, and common issues to fix.

prompt_templates.title: Attribution setup
prompt_templates.prompt: Explain how to set up multi-touch attribution in HubSpot for a hybrid PLG/Sales-led motion. Include W-shaped model configuration and reporting recommendations.

output_examples.input: Analyze my CAC: LinkedIn $15k for 10 customers, Google Search $12k for 20 customers, SEO $5k for 15 customers
output: Recommendation: SEO has the lowest CAC, consider increasing budget. Google Search shows strong efficiency for high-intent traffic.

best_practices: Use multi-touch attribution for hybrid PLG/Sales motions to get full-funnel visibility
Start LinkedIn campaigns at $50/day and scale 20% weekly if CAC stays below target
Test at least 4-6 experiments per month across channels with proper statistical significance
anti_patterns: Using last-touch attribution only, which ignores the nurturing influence of awareness campaigns
Scaling budgets without verifying CAC efficiency first
Neglecting UTM parameter consistency across campaigns, which breaks attribution

faq.question: What platforms does this skill support?
faq.answer: LinkedIn Ads, Google Ads, Meta Ads, HubSpot, Google Analytics, and SEO tools like Ahrefs and SEMrush.

faq.question: What is the target CAC for B2B SaaS Series A?
faq.answer: Blended CAC should be under $300. LinkedIn typically $150-400, Google Search $80-250, SEO $50-150.

faq.question: How does this skill integrate with HubSpot?
faq.answer: Provides campaign tracking setup, lead scoring configuration, attribution model guidance, and workflow templates.

faq.question: Is my data safe when using this skill?
faq.answer: Yes. This is a prompt-based skill with no code execution. No data leaves your environment.

faq.question: Why is my CAC higher than benchmark?
faq.answer: Common causes: Poor landing page conversion, weak offer, targeting too broad or narrow, or insufficient tracking for proper optimization.

faq.question: How does this differ from hiring an agency?
faq.answer: This skill provides strategic frameworks and calculations. Agencies execute campaigns and manage day-to-day optimization. Use both for best results.
